import React from "react"; import ExperienceCard from "../utils/ExperienceCard"; const Experience = () => { return (

Experience

Developed Python script to scrape a substantial dataset of social media content in (non-English language) Tamil, enabling large-scale analysis of hate speech. , <> Trained and deployed a cutting-edge language transformer model to accurately classify hate speech text in Tamil, achieving{" "} 95% accuracy {" "} ton benchmark dataset. , <> Designed and Implemented an {" "} API deployment pipeline{" "}, streamlining access to the hate speech detection model for real-world applications. , <> Optimized of CGM neural networks’ prediction accuracy, achieving a{" "} 90% success rate{" "} (less than .2cm, .4cm, .6cm, 1cm, and rejected) for comprehensive result analysis. , <> Implemented a 5-category error evaluation system, incorporating EC2 for computing and S3 for data storage, to strengthen infrastructure scalability and reliability. , ]} skills={[ "ElasticSearch", "FastAPI", "PostgreSQL", "RESTful API Web Services", "Celery", "AWS", ]} link="https://arabicsearch.org/home" /> Designed and implemented a Notional service using Python Bottle framework, serving{" "} seven systems and calculating critical intraday and end-of-the-day notional values for approximately{" "} 500K daily executed trades. , <> Decoupled reg assessment from trade booking using{" "} event-driven architecture , eliminating single point of failures and time-outs due to dependencies on external services which significantly improved booking efficiency by{" "} 80%. , <> Built Smart Reg - regulatory reporting framework using React Native,{" "} reducing SDLC duration by 87% {" "} for data quality changes and creating a scalable, configurable platform for all jurisdictions, enabling quick onboarding of new reports. , <> Optimized trade booking workflow by implementing non-persistent session-based TTL (time to live) caching for ’Can I Transact’ checks executed during trade booking,{" "} reducing booking time by 60% . , ]} skills={[ "Python", "Optimization", "Unit/Integration Testing", "Test Driven Development", "Equity Derivatives", "Equity Trading", ]} /> Constructed an internal reconciliation system that generates and transfers daily end-of-day reports for{" "} 1.5M trade life-cycle events , ensuring accurate trade state and valuation data is available for business continuity. , <> Developed a{" "} REST API based client for the ’Can I Transact’ service, enabling pre-trade checks and post-trade reporting checks for{" "} Equities, FX, and Rates trades . , ]} skills={["Python", "Bottle", "RESTful API Web Services"]} />
); }; export default Experience;
